select s.STAND_ID, s.GOODS_ID, s.STANDTYPE_ID, s.CREATETIME, st.STANDTYPENAME, g.GOODSNAME, f.FILEPATH from s left join standtype st on s.standtype_id = st.standtype_id left join goods g on s.goods_id = g.goods_id left join file f on s.stand_id = f.reference_id and f.filetype = '3' where 1 = 1
and ( g.GOODSNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and s.STANDTYPE_ID = #{pd.STANDTYPE_ID}
order by s.STAND_ID DESC

select s.STAND_ID, s.GOODS_ID, s.STANDTYPE_ID, s.CREATETIME, st.STANDTYPENAME, g.GOODSNAME, f.FILEPATH from s left join standtype st on s.standtype_id = st.standtype_id left join goods g on s.goods_id = g.goods_id left join file f on s.stand_id = f.reference_id and f.filetype = '3' where 1 = 1
and ( g.GOODSNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keywords}),'%') )
and s.STANDTYPE_ID = #{STANDTYPE_ID}
order by s.STAND_ID DESC
select STANDTYPE_ID, STANDTYPENAME from standtype order by STANDTYPE_ID ASC

select s.STAND_ID, s.GOODS_ID, s.STANDTYPE_ID, s.CREATETIME, st.STANDTYPENAME, g.GOODSNAME, f.FILEPATH from s left join standtype st on s.standtype_id = st.standtype_id left join goods g on s.goods_id = g.goods_id left join file f on s.stand_id = f.reference_id and f.filetype = '3' where s.STAND_ID = #{STAND_ID}
